page.title: 19LIFESTYLES - PUBLIC HOUSES
page.content: THOROLD ARMS{HARMSTON}:Brewery tenant. Bar meals 50p_Â£2.25. Speciality home- made pies.Clientele car trade, locals. No extra staff.Attractions flourishing pool,darts & domino teams in the Lincoln & A607(Cliff Pubs)leagues. THE BELL{COLEBY}:Brewery tenant. Speciality catering.Bar meals 75p _ Â£6.25. A La Carte Restaurant,Â£10 3-course meal.Clientele car & tourist trade,2_300 people daily.Staff _ 2 qualified chefs,16 others,including 5 villagers. Attractions _ catering, pleasant,rambling,old inn,open fires in all 4 bars. TEMPEST ARMS{COLEBY}:Freehouse. Speciality_real ale.Bar meals 45p_Â£2. Clientele local,car trade,Viking Way Walkers.Staff_4 part_timers. Attractions_Separate pool & games room and garden for under-age clientele eg. school parties.
